author: ogel3001
title: Small set, very expensive.
review:
This set is very very expensive for its size.

Pros

  • Bandit fig.
  • The only Rock Raiders promotional that has wheels.

Cons

  • The vehicle is a bit small.
  • The sweets were made in 2000. Hmm.
  • Bandit has no chair so he can fall off the back of the bulldozer.

Overall, it probably would be worth it to buy the pieces bulk. Apart from that it's a pretty good set.
